title: MD
biography: Ibrahim Ibrahim Abubakar is an epidemiologist who is Vice Provost (Health) and Professor of Infectious Disease Epidemiology at University College London. He was Pro-Provost (Health) and Dean of the Faculty of Population Health Sciences.
aiSummary: Ibrahim Abubakar is a uk health honors specialist with an H-index of 106 at UCLEpidemiology (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, New England Journal of Medicine, Cell. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
